findings.title: Unlimited Minting
findings.description: Addresses with MINTER_ROLE can mint additional tokens without an upper limit.

findings.title: BLACKLIST_ROLE Privilege Escalation
findings.description: The BLACKLIST_ROLE has the capability to add any address to the blacklist, preventing users from transferring their ARDX tokens

findings.title: Use uint256(1)/uint256(2) instead of Boolean States
findings.description: Using boolean variables in Solidity leads to extra Gas consumption due to additional Gas costs associated with write operations. Using uint256(1) and uint256(2) for representing true and false states helps in optimizing Gas usage, making the contract more cost-effective.
